parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Filter penanganan by created date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: Get penanganan records assigned to a specific patient
get.description: Get penanganan records filtered by patient. Dokter can see all assigned records to specific patient, Pasien can only see their own assigned records

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Patient user ID (required for dokter, ignored for pasien role)

200.description: List of penanganan records assigned to the patient

400.description: User ID is required for dokter

message.example: Data penanganan tidak ditemukan di trash

no_telp.description: Nomor telepon, hanya angka, 10 sampai 15 digit

items.example: Nama sudah terdaftar, silakan gunakan nama lain.

parameters.description: Filter videos by created date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

processed_video.description: Processed video file with bounding box

post.summary: Assign a video to a user

get.summary: Get videos assigned to a specific patient

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Filter videos by assigned patient ID

200.description: List of videos assigned to the specified patient
